quiz.question: What does 'Actions speak louder than words' mean?
Which classical poet coined the Latin phrase 'Carpe diem'?
Which English proverb collection was published by John Heywood in 1546?
options: A dialogue containing the number in effect of all the Prouerbes in the Englishe tongue
quiz.answer: A dialogue containing the number in effect of all the Prouerbes in the Englishe tongue

quiz.question: Complete: 'A penny saved is a penny ___'
Which proverb expresses skepticism about appearances using rhyme?
options: Don't judge a book by its cover
All that glitters is not gold
quiz.answer: All that glitters is not gold

quiz.question: Which famous line did Alexander Pope write that is often quoted as a proverb about error and forgiveness?
options: Brevity is the soul of wit
To err is human; to forgive, divine
quiz.answer: To err is human; to forgive, divine

quiz.question: What does 'Don't count your chickens before they hatch' advise?
Which author collected many English proverbs in the 17th century?
Which method do paremiologists use to trace a proverb's origin across languages?
Complete: 'Don't bite off more than you can ___'
Which fable explains the lesson 'Slow and steady wins the race'?
Which proverb phrase did Shakespeare use meaning true appearances can be deceptive, originally spelled 'glisters'?
options: Too many cooks spoil the broth
A rolling stone gathers no moss
All that glisters is not gold
quiz.answer: All that glisters is not gold

quiz.question: What advice does 'A stitch in time saves nine' give?
Which proverb tells you to avoid unnecessary risk by preparing backup plans?
options: Idle hands are the devil's workshop
Don't put all your eggs in one basket
quiz.answer: Don't put all your eggs in one basket

quiz.question: Which novelist borrowed a line from Robert Burns for his title 'Of Mice and Men'?
